column4: Is anybody else having any problems with the ATI Proprietary drivers on ubuntu 9.10 2.6.31-16? After installing, when X tries to start, the machine locks with a black screen.
yes, they often fail since xorg 7.3
probably they don't work, but the open source radeon are fine in meantime
yeah, I could do with 3d accell though ;p
so remove that package from command line and reconfigure x
i have, but what i mean is
do you know which version of xorg is the latest that works with the ati proprietary drivers?
you said 7.3.. what version system is that?
i meant, what numbering system. xorg hasn't got that high.
not sure where you're getting those numbers from.. X -version or xdpyinfo | grep version will give you 1.x.x
talking 'bout xorg, your's is the sever
switching back to 9.04 jaunty could help you, see : http://tinyurl.com/y8exof4
just realized, i am using 7.4, not 7.5
would you recommend changing the version in /etc/apt/preferences to jaunty?
